titles.title: Not What These Hands Have Done (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Not what these hands have done Can save my guilty soul Not what this toiling flesh has borne Can make my spirit whole Not what I feel or do Can give me peace with God Not all my prayers and sighs and tears Can bear my awful load{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy work alone O Christ Can ease this weight of sin Thy blood alone O Lamb of God Can give me peace within Thy love to me O God Not mine O Lord to Thee Can rid me of this dark unrest And set my spirit free{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy grace alone O God To me can pardon speak Thy pow'r alone O Son of God Can this sore bondage break No other work save Thine No other blood will do No strength save that which is divine Can bear me safely through{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I bless the Christ of God I rest on love divine And with unfalt'ring lip and heart I call this Savior mine His cross dispels each doubt I bury in His tomb Each thought of unbelief and fear Each ling'ring shade of gloom{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I praise the God of grace I trust His truth and might He calls me His I call Him mine My God my joy my light 'Tis He who saveth me And freely pardon gives I love because He loveth me I live because He lives{/lang-eng}
